patthana11.7:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
patthana11.7:0.3_0: he too is skilled in the articulate.
patthana11.7:1.1_0: should not give up what is unskillful ...
patthana11.7:1.1_1: don’t give up the unskillful qualities that should be given up by developing.
patthana11.7:1.1_4: is ignorant of the Holy One.
patthana11.7:10.1_0: skilled in the teachings of the unskillful.
patthana11.7:11.1_4: is ignorant of the Holy One.
patthana11.7:13.1_0: Transmigrating as a result of four bases ...
patthana11.7:2.1_0: By development, you shouldn’t give up the unskillful qualities that should be given up by developing.
patthana11.7:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up what is unskillful ...
patthana11.7:3.1_1: You shouldn’t give up what is unskillful.
patthana11.7:3.1_4: is ignorant of the Holy One.
patthana11.7:4.1_0: By development, they can’t give up the unskillful qualities that should be given up by developing.
patthana11.7:5.1_0: skilled in the dimension of infinite space ...
patthana11.7:6.1_3: is ignorant of the Holy One.
patthana11.7:7.1_0: There is no way of speaking from the unskillful.
patthana11.7:8.1_0: unskillful qualities never spoke ill of the noble ones;
patthana11.7:8.1_1: not skilled in the ways of teaching.
patthana11.7:8.1_4: is ignorant of the Holy One.
patthana11.7:9.1_0: he is neither skilled nor trained in the teaching of the unskillful.
